title: Food superstitions
description: Does carving scary faces into pumpkins really frighten away evil spirits?

vocabItems.definition: old, unscientific beliefs which are connected with magic rather than human reason
prevent someone or something from harming you; repel
evil eyebad luck or magical spells which have the power to cause bad things to happen
idiomatic phrase used to describe many examples of related things
foodstuff mixing fruit, spices, sugar and vinegar
show you what you should or should not do in the future, as a result of experience
